Timers¶

Timers based on SysTick and TIM7¶

void systick_setup()¶

systich_setup() - setup SysTick.

Return: void.

void delay_ms_systick(uint32_t ms)¶

delay_us_systick() - dalay based on systick. @uint32_t time_ms: time in miliseconds.

Return: void.

void one_shot_timer_tim7_setup()¶

one_shot_timer_tim7_setup() - setup TIM7 as one shot timer.

Return: void.

void delay_us_tim7(uint32_t time_us)¶

delay_us_tim7() - dalay based on one shot timer TIM7. @uint32_t time_us: time in microseconds.

Return: void.
